description: This file defines the ServiceRegistry class which manages the registration and lookup of service handles within a Java application, primarily for inter-process communication and service discovery. It maintains a concurrent hash map for quick service handle retrieval based on IPC and event ports, and generates a unique process identifier upon initialization.

classes.name: ServiceRegistry
classes.description: Manages service registration and lookup for IPC and event communication within a Java runtime.

methods.name: registerService
methods.description: Registers a service handle for IPC and/or event ports.

methods.name: getServiceForIpcPort
methods.description: Retrieves the service handle associated with a given IPC port.

methods.name: getServiceForEventPort
methods.description: Retrieves the service handle associated with a given event port.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the process ID and the lookup map; called once per JVM.

methods.name: getProcessIdentifier
methods.description: Returns the unique process identifier generated at startup.
